data.title: Construction Projects
data.text:
The condition of our roadways in Rochester Hills is of the utmost importance as we seek to keep people safe when traveling through our community. Our team oversees a variety of paving, reconstruction and resurfacing projects, along with work on the infrastructure under our roads like water or sewer lines. Most roads in the City fall under the

jurisdiction of the City of Rochester Hills. Others, however, may be under county or state jurisdiction. The entity responsible for maintaining the roads depends on whose jurisdiction it falls under.

Below are some of the development projects that are either upcoming or in progress now for the City of

Rochester Hills. We will update this page as new information is made available. For more information, please email dps@rochesterhills.org or call 248-656-4685.

Projects

Walton Boulevard (RCOC Project)

Proposed Start Date: April 15, 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: August 16, 2024 (Roadway opened to traffic June 19, 2024)

Project Description: The 2.2-mile project includes milling the road surface, paving with asphalt, culvert replacement, concrete curb and gutter repairs, ADA-compliant sidewalk ramps, minor storm sewer improvements, new pavement markings. See the RCOC's Construction Website for more information.

Traffic Control: The road will have one lane open in each direction during construction. Residential and business access will be maintained throughout construction.

Project Agency: Road Commission for Oakland County. Call 877-858-4804 or email dcsmail@rcoc.org.

Dutton Road Mill and Overlay Project

Proposed Start Date: May 7

Anticipated Completion Date: Unknown

Project Description: The limits are from Brewster east to the end of pavement and/or just past Rainbow Drive as shown below on the interactive construction map or RCOC construction website. They will be milling about 2 inches of pavement off and paving a fresh 2 inch layer back.

Project Agency: Oakland Twp, RCOC, and City of Rochester Hills

Construction Engineer: Road Commission of Oakland County (RCOC)

Barclay Circle Rehabilitation and Bike Lane Project

Proposed Start Date: April 15, 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: September 20: all paving complete and open to traffic. October 11: restoration complete.

Project Description: Project will rehabilitate the road surface on Barclay Circle between Auburn Road and Rochester Road. Road configuration includes the reduction in travel lanes from 2 lanes in each direction to one lane in each direction, maintaining the center turn lane and adding two bike lanes, one on each side of the road. Driveways off Barclay Circle will be impacted.

Traffic Control: During construction, traffic on Barclay Circle will be reduced to one lane in each direction. Access to all businesses will be maintained at all times.

Project Agency: City of Rochester Hills - Keith Depp - 248-656-4640

Construction Engineer: OHM Advisors - Paul Wilkerson - 734-891-2439 or Paul.wilkerson@ohm-advisors.com.

Leach Road Paving

Proposed Start Date: May 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: November 15, 2024

Project Description: Asphalt paving of Leach Road from Auburn to Waterview Drive, grading, curb and gutter installation, concrete sidewalk along west side of Leach, water main relocation, installation of a water quality structure, storm sewer improvements, and other miscellaneous items of work.

Traffic Control: Northbound only traffic will be maintained throughout project duration.

Project Agency: City of Rochester Hills - Keith Depp - 248-656-4640

Construction Engineer: HRC Consulting Engineers - Jake Darnell 248-454-6816 or JDar nall@hrcengr.com

Avon Industrial Drive Water Main Replacement Project

Proposed Start Date: April 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: August 1, 2024

Project Description: Replacement of approximately 9,000 linear feet of water main (6,700 ft of pipe bursting, 1,600 ft of open cut, and 750 ft of horizontal directional drilling) along Avon Industrial Drive, Start Ct., and in an existing water main easement along the north side of the westbound M-59 ramp right-of-way.

Traffic Control: Open to local traffic at all times.

Project Agency: City of Rochester Hills - Tracey Balint - 248-656-4640

Construction Engineer: HRC Consulting Engineers - Jake Darnell 248-454-6816 or JDar nall@hrcengr.com

Relocation of Pressure Reducing Valve (Brewster & Walton)

Proposed Start Date: Late March 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: June 2024

Project Description: Relocation of the pressure reducing valve (PRV) facility located at the northeast corner of Walton Boulevard and Brewster Road as well as installation of water main to connect new facility to existing water system.

Traffic Control: Intermittent lane closure along Walton.

Project Agency: City of Rochester Hills - Tracey Balint - 248-656-4640

Construction Engineer: HRC Consulting Engineers - Jake Darnell - 248-454-6816 or JDarnall@hrcengr.com

Avon Industrial Drive Road Improvements Project

Proposed Start Date: Spring 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: December 3, 2024

Project Description: Reconstruction of approximately 0.5 miles of Avon Industrial Drive and 370 feet of Star Court.

Traffic Control: Open to local traffic at all times

Project Agency: City of Rochester Hills - Tracey Balint - 248-656-4640

Construction Engineer: HRC Consulting Engineers - Jake Darnell - 248-454-6816 or JDarnall@hrcengr.com

2024 Asphalt Road and Pathway Rehabilitation Program

Proposed Start Date: Spring 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: August 26, 2024

Project Description:

Part A – North Brooklands Subdivision Rehabilitation

The proposed work consists of a full width (22 foot wide) 1.5 inch depth surface mill and overlay.

Part B – Marketplace Circle Rehabilitation

The proposed work consists of a full width (36 foot wide) 1.5 inch depth surface mill and overlay.

Part C – Adams Rd, west side Pathway Rehabilitation (Tienken to Dutton)

The proposed work consists of repairing existing asphalt pathway before overlaying the entire length of Pathway.

Project Agency: City of Rochester Hills. Keith Depp - 248-656-4640

Construction Engineer: Spalding DeDecker and Associates - Grady Rollins - 734-968-8633 or grollins@sda-eng.com

2024 Concrete Road Replacement Program

Proposed Start Date: Spring 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: August 26, 2024

Project Description: Reconstruction of local concrete roads at various locations throughout the City.

Traffic Control: One side of the road will be closed at a time while under construction. One way access will be maintained at all times.

Project Agency: City of Rochester Hills - Keith Depp - 248-656-4640

Construction Engineer: Spalding DeDecker and Associates - Grady Rollins - 734-968-8633 or grol lins@sda-eng.com

Adams Rd Pedestrian Crossing @ Marketplace

Proposed Start Date: Spring 2024

Anticipated Completion Date: June 2024

Project Description: Installation of a HAWK signal style pedestrian crossing near Marketplace Circle.

Traffic Control: Intermittent lane closures along Adams Rd.

Project Agency: City of Rochester Hills - Keith Depp - 248-656-4640

Construction Engineer: OHM Advisors Construction - Paul Wilkerson - 734-891-2439 or Paul.wilkerson@ohm-advisors.com.
